author's_name_(_зохиогч): DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES GANG DU 'GRO BA'I PHYOGS KYI YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD LHA NGO MI NGO 'PHROD PA'I DGA'  STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI,  SPYIR DENG SANG YUL DUS KYI DBANG LAS SO SO'I 'DOD SBYOR GYI BSANG SPYI SGER MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG SNANG BAS NGA BZOD BRI IDGOS PA MI 'DUG KYANG, ,GCIG TU PHYOGS 'GRO LTA BUR 'DI 'DRA RE DGOS PA BYUNG TSE YI GE MANG PO ZHIG KLAG KYANG LA LA 'BREL MED DANG, ,PHAL CHER SPYI KHYAB BAm MI BA ZHIG LAS SHIG THOG MDZU LTAR GNANG THOG TU KHEL DES SHIG @009B MI YOD DUG PAS DE 'DRAR PHAN PA ZHIG SRED SNYAM NAS BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES ZAB RGYAS MANG PO MA SRIS SHING, ,MING GSAL GYI RIGS NGOR TE DON DRIL BAR BKOD PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O, ,)
